messages.message: Site admin is missing a repo that build needs by default!

Would it instead be possible to get prebuilt apps on crafting for site admins? I'm essentially trying to verify this fix here with manual testing

https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/67653 (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/67653)

yep it should be possible! you just need to have an ibflowbin handy and click on "Create advanced app" as a site admin on your sandbox (see https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ENG/pages/2381742081/Advanced+Apps+for+AIHub#Create-Advanced-App)

i've done this multiple times this week on my crafting sandbox, so let me know if you have any issues!
